text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ping ping!☆ My Umadol Sensor is reacting! I've chosen you! It's decided, just like that♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
…Aaah, wait, wait! Please don't leave! 
I'm sorry, could you just hear me out, please!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Listen, listen! I have a little something 
I'd really love your help with!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Actually, it's almost Falko's birthday! 
Oh, you'll celebrate with me? 
Thank you so much♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But listen, Falko is an Umadol! 
For an Umadol, a birthday isn't just 
a day to be celebrated by others ——

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
"It's a day to share my thanks 
with everyone who always cheers 
for me!" Which is why ——

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Falko wants to hold a birthday concert! 
And I want it to be a massive, spectacular, 
BOOM☆ of an event!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
That's why I need you to gather the 
absolute maximum number of people 
by the day of the concert!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Falko is going to work hard on lessons too! 
I've even put together a ultra-mega-super 
special program!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
That's why… I'm begging you! 
Please help Falko make this birthday 
concert a huge success!
